text:
It seems that the MultipartHttpServletRequestAction does nothing more than a
little bit of logging. It is still defined in the sitemaps but I could not find
anywhere where it was actually used. Can we just remove it?

BTW the UploadAction also handles multipart requests by using
org.apache.cocoon.servlet.multipart.Part so it seems that a dedicated class in
Lenya is no longer needed.
creator: egli@apache.org
